Be More Than a Visitor

Join the Museum. Make it Yours.

Membership is a great way to support the Napa Valley Museums arts, education and community programs. Member benefits now include free admission to both The NVMY and The MAC, invitations to exclusive events, plus a host of special perks and savings. Upgrade to Patron Membership to provide a superior level of support and receive a higher level of access, exclusive benefits and priority ticketing privileges.

Support

Independent Museums

Fiercely Independent

Napa Valley Museum is a small town museum making a big impact. we create utterly original exhibitions to delight our visitors, both local and on tour, while showcasing the art, history and culture of the region.

For the most part we earn our way. We dont depend on federal funding or major state government support. We rely on our members, supporters, sponsors, and on the visitors who attend our exhibitions, shop our store and buy tickets to our events. You are the ones who fund our arts and education programs.

Help keep small town, independent museums around. Please support our nonprofit museum now.

The Napa Valley Museum is a nonprofit 501c3 organization dedicated to enriching the cultural fabric of our community through exhibitions, collections, educational programs and creative activities that promote knowledge and understanding of art, nature and history.
